name: Grilled Delmonico Steaks
author: MACAW06
summary: Marinated steaks so tender you can cut with a fork!  Friends and family always come running when they know I'm grilling.
directions: Combine the olive oil, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, garlic, onion, salt, pepper, rosemary, steak seasoning, and steak sauce in the container of a food processor or blender
Prick steaks on both sides with a fork, and place in a shallow container with a lid
Pour marinade over steaks, cover, and refrigerate at least 3 hours, or overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat, or light charcoal, and wait until coals are completely white
Soaked wood chips may be added to the coals when ready for a smoky flavor, if you like
Remove steaks from marinade, and discard the marinade
Lightly oil the grilling surface, and place steaks on the grill
Cover, and grill steaks for about 10 minutes on each side, or to your desired degree of doneness
